repos_data.description: Picocli is a modern framework for building powerful, user-friendly, GraalVM-enabled command line apps with ease. It supports colors, autocompletion, subcommands, and more.  In 1 source file so apps can include as source & avoid adding a dependency. Written in Java, usable from Groovy, Kotlin, Scala, etc.

Generic Bash and ZSH auto complete script. Creates an auto completable command tree with simple but powerful modular configuration. Supports custom and built-in auto completion types. Generates help output. CLI "framework" in one script.
